howItWorks.title: It's Really This Easy
howItWorks.subtitle: Just three simple stepsâ€”no technical knowledge needed
howItWorks.bottomText: That's it! No complicated settings or technical work.

uploadObject.title: Upload Your Object
uploadObject.description: Take a photo of what you want to wrapâ€”a car, wall, table, or anything else. Upload it here.

uploadDesign.title: Upload Your Design
uploadDesign.description: Upload a photo of the material or pattern you wantâ€”wood, carbon fiber, or any texture.

getResult.title: Get Your Result
getResult.description: Wait 30 seconds and your wrapped image is ready! Download it and use it right away.

pricing.title: Start Free, Grow at Your Pace
pricing.subtitle: Everyone gets 3 free wrappings to try. No credit card needed to start!
pricing.bottomText: Every plan works the same wayâ€”just choose how many wrappings you need. Credits never expire and you can always buy more later.

features.title: Creating realistic wrappings with AI is now effortless
features.subtitle: Get instant, professional, and fast results

worksOnAnything.title: Built by Professional Wrapping Experts
worksOnAnything.description: Cars, walls, furniture, buildingsâ€”if you can photograph it, we can wrap it with any design you like

anyPatternOrTexture.title: Any Pattern or Texture
anyPatternOrTexture.description: Vinyl wrappings, wood grain, carbon fiber, marble, metalâ€”use any material photo you want

superFast.title: Super Fast
superFast.description: Your results are ready in just 30 seconds. No waitingâ€”upload and go!

looksCompletelyReal.title: Looks Completely Real
looksCompletelyReal.description: The shape stays perfect while the material wraps naturally with realistic light and shadows

easyToSave.title: Easy to Save
easyToSave.description: Download high-quality visuals instantly. Share them with clients or use them however you need

yourLanguage.title: In Your Language
yourLanguage.description: The app was built in Turkish, but you can use it in other languages too
